Do you know if there are plans for this added functionality? ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"id":"eyJfdHlwZSI6IlVzZXIiLCJpZCI6IjE0ODc4NTUyODYifQ","entityText":"Josh"},"mutability":"IMMUTABLE","type":"USER"}}}

{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"53pid","text":"For graph-svc when is the change going in for Auto Persisted Queries (APQ) to include Redis Caching. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9iaf5","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"424tv","text":"here =>","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":277,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"foaod","text":"https://dev.azure.com/yammer/engineering/_git/graph-svc?path=/service/src/main/java/com/yammer/graph/core/service/bundles/graphql/preparsed/persisted/PersistedQueryCacheImpl.java&version=GBmaster&line=27&lineEnd=27&lineStartColumn=4&lineEndColumn=56&lineStyle=plain&_a=contents","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1rru2","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5k9r7","text":"Thank you.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"66dv3","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1mo4r","text":"I’m asking because currently, the system behavior is: we first attempt to load using a SHA-256 hash, and if that fails, we fall back to a second request without the hash.","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"629gs","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"afg2b","text":"The concern being raised is that this initial load—across all our servers—is resulting in duplicate requests until each server gets that query one time. I’ve explained that it’s a one-time cost per server and that this should be resolved once Redis is deployed. However, that explanation doesn’t seem to be sufficient for some folks to release this beyond where it' s at, so I wanted to see what the precise timeline is; the value is high. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8aiqg","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"5daf4","text":"// this is related to the v5 end point discussion. ","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"citaj","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":17,"offset":0},{"key":3,"length":13,"offset":18}],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"1c27m","text":"Charles Kuncheria Ricardo Dotta this is tracking this  ","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{"0":{"data":{"url":"https://dev.azure.com/yammer/engineering/_git/graph-svc?path=/service/src/main/java/com/yammer/graph/core/service/bundles/graphql/preparsed/persisted/PersistedQueryCacheImpl.java&version=GBmaster&line=27&lineEnd=27&lineStartColumn=4&lineEndColumn=56&lineStyle=plain&_a=contents"},"mutability":"MUTABLE","type":"LINK"},"1":{"data":{"id":"eyJfdHlwZSI6IlVzZXIiLCJpZCI6IjE1MDc4MTAzNzEifQ","entityText":"Charles Kuncheria"},"mutability":"IMMUTABLE","type":"USER"},"3":{"data":{"id":"eyJfdHlwZSI6IlVzZXIiLCJpZCI6IjM3Nzk5MDE4NjU5ODQifQ","entityText":"Ricardo Dotta"},"mutability":"IMMUTABLE","type":"USER"}}}

body.serializedContentState: {"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":7,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"7b1qp","text":"Q2 2025","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"8i54q","text":"The Graph crew will continue to operate at reduced capacity this quarter, with the following service levels changes:","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"9uae8","text":"","type":"unstyled"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"length":20,"offset":0}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":20,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"},{"length":22,"offset":47,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"9chod","text":"Graph Schema Reviews: Resuming twice a week on Tuesdays and Thursdays","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":27,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"1k1ji","text":"Building on GraphQL Channel: Will remain open for developer discussions, with no active support from the Graph crew.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":26,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"fhv28","text":"Graph Champions Group Chat: Continues to be fully supported by the Graph crew.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":1,"length":15,"offset":117}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":10,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"},{"length":15,"offset":117,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"brcad","text":"PR Reviews: Support remains on a first-come, first-served basis. For faster turnaround, we recommend leveraging your Graph Champions for reviews and sign-off.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":13,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"3oobe","text":"QoS Inquiries: Operations performance & reliability questions will be handled at a lower priority and may experience delays.","type":"unordered-list-item"},{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"length":6,"offset":105}],"inlineStyleRanges":[{"length":12,"offset":0,"style":"BOLD"}],"key":"bhde0","text":"Urgent Needs: Please escalate critical issues via your EM.
